title: Using AWS Lambda with Amazon Kinesis without Batch Item Handling
description: Using AWS Lambda with Amazon Kinesis without Batch Item Handling.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The Lambda function retrieves Kinesis Records from the event parameter that it receives. The function retrieves Kinesis payload, decode from Base64 and log them to cloudwatch. The function processes Kinesis Records without batch item handling.
